name: SummitVista

”Alexa, open Summit Vista”
”Alexa, ask Summit Vista about announcements”

skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: summit vista
des:
Summit Vista Community Skill:
Welcome to the Summit Vista Community Skill. You can use our in-house skill to stay up to date on community information such as "Daily Specials", and "Events/Announcements" that are taking place here at Summit Vista.
